Microsoft Stream Videos

 

Team MINT | Demo | Slack (questions, feedback, requests, troubleshooting) 

 

You can use MS Stream videos in Posts and Pages. Simply get the URL of the video from your MS Stream Library and use the video embedding link. The video is not uploaded to Connect but simply embedded! Video editors can consolidate subtitles, transcripts, metadata in one place (MS Stream) and when a video is updated, it is directly updated in Connect. Users/viewers need a MS License.
Keywords: MS Stream, videos, pages and posts

Drafts Posts in Editorial Calendar

 

Team TES | Demo | Slack (questions, feedback, requests, troubleshooting) 

 

The Editorial Calendar's improved Weekly View now includes an option to plan draft posts and remove planned posts from the sidebar. This improvement also applies to the Weekly View in the Advanced Editorial Calendar.
Keywords: Editorial Calendar, Drafts, Posts, Scheduling, Planning

External Content & Files

 

Team WORMS | Demo | Slack (questions, feedback, requests, troubleshooting) 

 

In External Content, you can now add PDF files, videos, and up to 20 images to your LinkedIn posts.
This is an internal email and not intended for external distribution. Please do not forward.
